description.@en: You can walk atop water as if it were land.

criticalFailure.@en: You cannot walk upon water. Nor, can you walk atop land! You cannot stand up without automatically being knocked Prone for the Duration of the spell.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but triple the Duration.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you can walk upon water or wet ground as if it were firm land.
